value:
$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Welcome, people of Askr. I am Eitri,
a humble scholar.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Wow! Such a collection of unusual
contraptions! This must be what you
call seiðjárn.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You have my thanks for helping us,
Eitri, but I worry for you, having just
opposed the king in such a way...$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't fret. His mood may be no
better now, but I can't imagine it
getting much worse.$k$pWithout seiðjárn, Niðavellir would be
nothing compared to what it is now.
Fáfnir can't afford to punish me.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm! Such insight for someone of
your years. I suppose that is what
makes you a genius.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Eitri, I am King Fáfnir's younger sister,
Reginn. I'm glad to finally meet you.$k$p$EFace_Anger|You must already have some idea,
but something is wrong with Fáfnir.
He now thinks only of conquest.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|He wasn't always that way. He used
to say he wanted to make Niðavellir
a land of plenty...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Fáfnir now poses a great threat to the
Kingdom of Askr. I hope to stop him.
Will you help us?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|First, let me ask you this... Do you
know how Niðavellir came to be?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Hmm... I think I remember studying
its history, but I can't recall...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Long ago, the dvergar were ruled by
the jötnar—but a young dvergr used
their craft to build great weapons.$k$pWith those weapons, the dvergar
fought on equal footing with the
jötnar and gained independence.$k$pThat young dvergr was named king,
and thus Niðavellir was born.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Quite right. After that, the first king
fostered a culture of inventors, and
that is how seiðjárn came into being.$k$p$EFace|As something of an inventor myself,
I have the utmost respect for our
first king—and I love this country.$k$pBut a coup d'état brought Niðavellir
to ruin... I will do anything to save this
country, so you have my support.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Eitri! I had hoped you'd
say just that!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Huh? What was that sound?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The remnants of Fáfnir's forces
must be advancing on us.$k$pThere is something I must investigate.
Please, handle the foes outside while
I work.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Understood. Let's go, everyone!$k$p$Sbs1000|
